ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] selling D2 acct. hoooow?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wait, 2000+ life?  Mine only 500-600 leh.  U mean ac or life??? Maybe u can also consider that unique helm tat blind ya target, forget name liao.  For all the
ygData.messageBody:
Wait, 2000+ life? Mine only 500-600 leh. U mean ac or life???

Maybe u can also consider that unique helm tat blind ya target, forget name
liao. For all the mobs u WW hit, they will be blinded for few seconds, ie
they won't attack or run away like flee, yet when u kill them u get the
corpses ;)

Mine is half resis, half skin, half spear, half bash (wasted, shld have
hold on a little bit longer and throw to spear mastery) max ww, now I'm
maxing my leap attack for pvp. My ornate only 789 ac but I need its resis.
I can solo in a 8 men hell 4 except last zone coz I dun wanna kill diablo
for the baron title. Maybe I need to do it so as to sell my acct for
better price, hehe.


On Friday, 06 October, 2000 4:44 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
wrote:
> Think ebay down for server updates. :P
>
> Iceblink is good if life(Hp ) is high. , Attack rating is good, damage
is
> good. My barb Life is now 1000+ . I learn from an old bard, he has got 3
> barbs char into the 80+ lvl, each specalizing in diff weapons. His stats
> are mainly : max-mastery, max-ww, half max skin, half max- nat resist.
max
> speed. half max- leap att. His barb life is over 2000+ with rings and
stuff
> . adding life items a must have.
> The type of make up is good PKing, Run faster than a Amazon, Leap attack
a
> Pald, necro, anything. sure win.
>
> Iceblink is nice to play when i know the type of enemies im facing. in
Act
> 4, I Frezze the mobs and hit them 3-4 times in a 5 player game and they
r
> down (one each). the down side is only cannot use find potion. all turn
to
> water liao..Hahahha
> In a solo or 2 players game, Can freeze and bring down a mob with one
> hit.max 2 hit.
> When im swarmed with mobs. gotta use the sun-tze method. : Divide and
> conquer. Run and some mobs follows , kill those that follows and WW
backward
> to the spot. with high speed skill, np.
> Most mobs in hell act 4 is lvl 74 -80, so percenatge to hit pretty good.
>
> Main problem is with named, especally the River of Flame, that "armoroer
> hits hard. that one needs to change back to Ornate.other named, Iceblink
> freeze cant ever hold for 1 sec :P
>
> Since i lost that 800+ ornate , now only git a 600+ one. no prawn, fish
also
> good ah.
> Iceblink only 95 def ar !!!!!
> Your helm is good, i gotta get a dmg -mana type boots or helm. good idea.
>
> regards
> Bibi
